title: Minestrone
ingredients: Kidney beans, drained (I sometimes add corn or other canned beans)
instructions: In a large saucepan, heat oil, add onions and saute 5 mins. Add broth, potatoes, and carrots. Over high heat, bring to boil. Reduce heat to low; cover & simmer 15 mins. Add green beans & remaining ingredients except kidney beans. (I also add red wine). Simmer 40 mins. Add kidney beans during last 5 mins. Serve with cheese.
